DOC.brief_summary: To provide efficacy and safety data of two doses (0.5 mg and 1.25 mg) of FTY720 in Japanese patients with relapsing multiple sclerosis (MS)
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of FTY720 in Patients With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
DOC.criteria: Male and female patients aged 1860 Patients with a diagnosis of multiple sclerosis Patients with a history or presence of chronic disease of the immune system other than MS Patients with a history or presence of malignancy, pulmonary or heart disease, etc. Pregnant or nursing (lactating) women Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
